titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter written from his excellency to the county of Warwick.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

notesStmt.note: Letter dated and signed: Worcester, October 2. 1642. Essex (i.e. Robert Devereux).
Calling on the trained Bands and volunteers to resist the march of the Kings forces on Coventry. -- Thomason catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
